text:
The Harvard Global Health Institute shows Texas is "already doing enough" #COVID19 tests to begin reopening business.

This analysis goes beyond the uninformed notion that one test number fits all states.

Still, Texas is ramping up testing.

#txlege

https://t.co/MAaU98CmLF
